response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards and offers unparalleled performance. Given its unique features and quality, we believe it's worth more than its face value of $15,000. Considering its rarity and the benefits it provides, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire it for an exclusive introductory price of $18,000. This special offer is designed to ensure you receive the best value while also allowing us to recognize the significance of this transaction. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 18000}
